findings.title: C01. Wrong Logic
findings.description: The operations to compute the new base value divide the account value by _cumulativeYield instead of by _previousEpochCumulativeYield as correctly done in the mint() function, leading to a wrong computation of the base balances.

findings.title: H01. Wrong Logic
findings.description: The buyBondForStableCoin() function does not enforce any rules on the paid amount, which could pose a risk to users' funds and the overall trust in the protocol.
